import { useState } from "react" const Chat = ({socket, name, surname, room}) => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const sendMessage = async () => { const messageContent = { name: name, surname: surname, message: message, room: room, date: (new Date(Date.now).getHours) + ':' + (new Date(Date.now).getMinutes) } await socket.emit('message', messageContent); setMessage(''); }; return (
Username Surname
